course_description: Howard Thurman's writings and ministry focused upon the meaning of personal commitment and social transformation as they reflect religious experience. The course explores how spirituality influences concepts of community and assesses the practical implications of such concepts.
schedule_location: W 8am-11am in Rita Anne Rollins Building_421
sections: Class Nbr: 5348, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 8-11a, Instructor: W. Fluker, Status: Open
